en.start: Welcome! This bot helps manage your group with commands like /ban, /kick, /warn, /mute, and more. Use /help for details.
en.help:
Commands:
/start - Start the bot
/ban - Ban a user
/unban - Unban a user
/kick - Kick a user
/mute - Mute a user
/unmute - Unmute a user
/warn - Warn a user
/unwarn - Remove a warning
/warns - Check warnings
/filter - Add a filter
/stop - Remove a filter
/filters - List filters
/welcome - Toggle welcome message
/setwelcome - Set welcome message
/setlang - Set language
/settings - Configure settings
en.no_target: Reply to a message or mention a user/ID.
en.kicked_after_warns: {user} was kicked due to too many warnings!
en.banned_after_warns: {user} was banned due to too many warnings!
en.muted_after_warns: {user} was muted due to too many warnings!
en.filter_usage: Reply to a message and use /filter <trigger>.
en.setwelcome_usage: Reply to a message to set the welcome text.

he.start: 专 !   注专  转 拽爪 注 驻拽转  /ban, /kick, /warn, /mute 注. 砖转砖 -/help 驻专.
he.help:
驻拽转:
/start - 转 转 
/ban - 住 砖转砖
/unban -  住
/kick - 专拽 砖转砖
/mute - 砖转拽 砖转砖
/unmute -  砖转拽
/warn - 转 专
/unwarn - 住专 专

/filter - 住祝 驻专
/stop - 住专 驻专
/filters - 专砖转 驻专
/welcome - 驻注/ 注转 拽转 驻

/setlang - 拽注 砖驻

he.unwarned: 专 砖 {user} 住专 ({count} 专转 转专)!
